response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the fish out of the fridge. The robot now has the fish in its inventory. The next step is to thaw the fish.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the fish out of the fridge.
(4) Thaw the fish.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Thaw the fish
    salmon = registry(env, "salmon_172")
    heat(robot, salmon)
    donothing(env)
